Package com.github.siroshun09.messages.api.source

Class AbstractMessageMap<T>

java.lang.Object
com.github.siroshun09.messages.api.source.AbstractMessageMap<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the message type
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageMap<T>, MessageSource<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
StringMessageMap
public abstract class AbstractMessageMap<T> extends Object implements MessageMap<T>
An abstract implementation of MessageMap.

    • getMessage

      @NotNull public T getMessage(@NotNull @NotNull String key)
      Gets the message of the specified key.

      If the message is not found, this method will return the alternate value (see implementation's docs).

      This method will return empty() if the message is not found.

      Specified by:
      getMessage in interface MessageSource<T>
      Parameters:
      key - the key to get the message
      Returns:
      the message or the alternate value
